purpose: Loads a single image URL and its metadata from the image store on demand, returning the resolved URL along with loading and error state.
Batch-loads multiple image URLs from the image store in a single request, returning a map of image IDs to resolved URLs with loading state.
Fetches and caches metadata (dimensions, entity info) for a set of image IDs from the image store, deduplicating requests when IDs have not changed.
Re-exported duplicate of hooks.ts useImageUrl that loads a single image URL and its metadata from the image store on demand, returning the resolved URL along with loading and error state.
Re-exported duplicate of hooks.ts useImageUrls that batch-loads multiple image URLs from the image store in a single request, returning a map of image IDs to resolved URLs with loading state.
Re-exported duplicate of hooks.ts useImageMetadata that fetches and caches metadata for a set of image IDs from the image store, deduplicating requests when IDs have not changed.
Triggers lazy loading of narrative events for a specific entity and returns the cached event list from the narrative store.
Returns the current overall status object (loading, error, ready flags) of the narrative store.
Returns whether the narrative store is currently performing a global loading operation.
Returns whether narrative events for a specific entity are currently being fetched.
Returns whether narrative events for a specific entity have been fully loaded and are ready for display.
Returns every narrative event currently held in the narrative store as a flat array.
Returns whether the full set of all narrative events is currently being fetched.
Returns whether the full set of all narrative events has finished loading.
Generates a seamlessly tileable parchment background by blending two source images through a canvas frequency-blend and mirror-tile pipeline, or uses a pre-baked tile URL when provided.
Provides a collapsible developer panel with sliders to live-tune parchment texture parameters (opacity, blur radius, detail strength) and reset them to defaults.
Renders decorative scroll-corner ornaments at the four corners of a page container for a manuscript-style visual frame.
Renders an ornamental SVG filigree divider with gold scrollwork and frost-blue accent tendrils for separating content sections.
Renders an SVG decorative frost-crystal band with irregular ice spikes and a blue-tinted gradient bar, positionable at the top or bottom edge of a container.
Tracks the browser window width and returns the current responsive breakpoint category (mobile, tablet, or desktop).
Manages the full lifecycle of domain-configuration projects in IndexedDB, providing CRUD operations, import/export as zip files, duplication, and automatic seeding of a default project on first use.
